document_data.name: Naneetha Shinalstar
document_data.mainbody:
'''Naneetha Shinalstar''' was a war-mage of [[Saelmur]] on the [[Lake of Steam]] in the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite polyhedron/103/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: A Treasure Tour of Turmish|23}}{{Cite web/The Candlekeep Collection}}
{{quote|''The treasures of Turmish are hidden amid all that beauty. Beautiful trees, dells with beautiful streams… oh, yes, and beautiful men, every one of them with secrets to be wormed out into the open.''|Excerpt from ''Memoirs of an Illithid-Human Crossbreed'' by Naneetha Shinalstar}}
document_data.Personality: [[Elminster]] considered her as a "cruel but clever temptress".
document_data.History:
Naneetha spent many years exploring the realm of [[Turmish]] in search of [[magic]] and wealth that she might use to advance the power of Saelmur to dominate the Lake of Steam. She shared some of what she learned with Elminster, and he figured that she returned time and again to Turmish simply because she had fallen in love with the place.

She published a biography in the {{YearlinkName|1355}}, titled ''[[Memoirs of an Illithid-Human Crossbreed]]''. Elminster assumed she wasn't really an [[illithid]]-human crossbreed but had just picked the title to shock the jaded yet sizeable [[Calishite]] readership, but he said he would find her and ask her some time.
